entry.tran: （吉他等乐器）原声的，自然声的，不用电传音的
entry.def: An acoustic guitar or other instrument is one whose sound is produced without any electrical equipment.
If you refer to the acoustics or the acoustic of a space, you are referring to the structural features which determine how well you can hear music or speech in it.

example.ex: In this performance, Rattle had the acoustic of the Symphony Hall on his side.
example.tran: 这场演出中，拉特尔有交响乐大厅出色的音响效果做他的后盾。

entry.def: Acoustics is the scientific study of sound.
Acoustic means relating to sound or hearing.

means.word_mean: 1. the study of the physical properties of sound
